text: John A. Young (March 26, 1854 – July 28, 1934) was a Canadian politician. He served in the Legislative Assembly of New Brunswick as member of the Conservative party representing York County from 1908 to 1925. ==References== Category:20th-century Canadian politicians Category:1854 births Category:1934 deaths Category:Progressive Conservative Party of New Brunswick MLAs
title: John Young (New Brunswick politician, born 1854)
